title: Champions That Can Solo Baron Without Items ?

embed.description: Champions that can solo Baron without items. On this video I am trying to solo Baron without any items with various champions. So far I could manage to Solo Baron with 4 of them. If you have any idea please share it with me on comments. Have fun!

body:
Hey guys, I was trying to find out which champions are able to Solo Baron without Items.

I am only using sandbox mode to make things faster. Making turrets invincible so game doesnt end instantly.
I am not using it for HP regen / No Cooldown / Infinite Mana etc etc.

So far I was able to Solo Baron without items with Zac, Shaco, Yorick, Mordekaiser.

If you have any other champion in mind that can solo baron without items. Please share your thoughts with me!

replies.body: Everyone here has no idea obviously it's nunu with his 1k true dmg on 8 sec CD with massive healing.
Hmm not sure if you can Solo Baron without any companion but I can try amazing lifesteal champions I guess.
LS champions op with items but not sure if it is doable with 18 lvl and dragon buffs. Gotta try it for sure along with Aatrox.
Zac was a real butt clencher O-O. btw {{champion:60}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:143}} ??
Zyra not doable due to short plants duration time for itemless squishy zyra. Not sure about Heimer gotta try it and I think it is also doable with  Elise. Thanks man!
Nasus and veigar if you stack up enough?
yep true that. Gotta try them but both needs so much effort (farm)

Which dragon slayer buffs do you use?

e. Oh nevermind. Still, I don't think 10 drakes is doable outside of sandbox.
Yea Used 10 drakes  on first tries, I am also not happy with that. But it is doable with only 1 drake with Morde and without drakes with Yorick. Still searching for more hcampions thou.
